Transloadit.com | Digital Marketing & Sales INTERN | REMOTE

Transloadit is a cloud encoder for images, video, and other content that needs marshalling around the internet. I’m not fond of labels, but B2B & SaaS seem to apply!

We’re looking for interns to help with our content, marketing strategy, run ads and sales. Currently thinking we’d like both a marketing and a sales intern to work in conjunction. We’re light on management and expect every team member to take the lead. We work remote and use Slack and GitHub to communicate & plan.

Since our service is by developers & for developers it’s important that you have affinity with that space, but I guess asking on Hacker News already gives us a good subset :)

This vacancy is not up on https://transloadit.com/jobs yet, but that page does explain a lot about our culture and vision.

Feel free to shoot an email with your resume and three sentences about why you’re a good fit to kvz@transloadit.com
